injuries.name: Lasting Injury
injuries.description: Roll for a new Flaw (in addition to any other Flaws you might have). Reroll duplicates.

injuries.name: Weak Immune System
injuries.description: Model auto-fails tests against Diseased and Poisoned.

injuries.name: Internal Bleeding
injuries.description: If model is Downed in the next Scenario they auto-fail their Death Save.

injuries.name: Broken Bones
injuries.description: -1 Agility.

injuries.name: Saddened
injuries.description: -1 Presence.

injuries.name: Weak
injuries.description: -1 Strength.

injuries.name: Malaise
injuries.description: -1 Toughness (can be cured with Tincture).

injuries.name: Maimed
injuries.description: -1 HP.

injuries.name: Lost Limb
injuries.description: Can only use One-Handed Weapons and has 1 fewer Equipment slot.

injuries.name: Missing Eye
injuries.description: Maximum range for ranged attacks and spells is reduced by 3 inches.

injuries.name: Afraid
injuries.description: Auto-fails Morale during the next Scenario.

injuries.name: Concussed
injuries.description: -1 to all rolls for the next Scenario only.

injuries.name: Sprained Ankle
injuries.description: -1 Agility for the next Scenario only.

injuries.name: Bruised Eye
injuries.description: -1 Presence for the next Scenario only.

injuries.name: Bruised Ribs
injuries.description: -1 Toughness for the next Scenario only.

injuries.name: Discombobulated
injuries.description: Swap two Stats at random.

injuries.name: Forgetful
injuries.description: Model immediately misplaces one random piece of Equipment or Weapon (permanently lost).

injuries.name: Only a Flesh Wound
injuries.description: No Injury.

injuries.name: Learn through Failure
injuries.description: Roll for one extra Feat.

injuries.name: What Doesn't Kill You Only Makes You Stronger
injuries.description: Remove one Flaw from this warband member.
